description:
[h1]Make Raids more intense! With your favorite Music![/h1]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Important![/h1]
[list]
[*]This is [b]NOT[/b] a file mod!
[*]This mod [b]DOES[/b] support multiplayer.
[*]To configure the mod, use this command: [code]/musicconfig[/code]
[*]By default, this mod [b]ONLY[/b] has one vanilla song, which [b]DOESN'T[/b] respect the volume slider in the raid music gui, but rather uses the music slider in the audio options.
[*]To add more songs, download song packs.
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Music Packs:[/h2]
[code]
[list]
[*][h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3497214220]VALVe Pack (Half-Life + Team Fortress 2)[/url][/h2]
[*][h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3497204579]Black Mesa Pack (Black Mesa + Black Mesa: Blue Shift)[/url][/h2]
[*][h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3497222935]Murder Drones Pack[/url][/h2]
[/list]
[*][h2]And more potentially coming in the future![/h2]
[/code]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Support:[/h2]
[*]Rate, Favorite, Share and Award!
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/ratefavourite.gif[/img]
name: Custom Raid Music
